noApiKeyDesc: Sorry, you need to specify a Sekund API Key before using this plugin. Please head to your Sekund account's settings to fix that.
noSettingsDesc: Please go to your Sekund account, get your subdomain and API Key and paste them below. You can create a free test account here.
noSubdomainDesc: Please specify the subdomain associated with your team/account.
noSuchSubdomain: Sorry, we could not find your specified subdomain.
offlineDesc: Sekund needs an internet connection to function.
uploadToSekundDesc: Your note will be available for sharing with other members of your workspace.
deleteFromSekundDesc: Your note will be removed from your Sekund.io account.
shareDesc: Your note is available for sharing, but you haven't shared it with anyone yet. Hit the 'Share' button below and pick people or groups with whom you want to share this note.
yourSharesDesc: Notes that your are sharing with this person
theirShares: Notes that this person is sharing with you
noOneDesc: Either share something with someone or ask someone to share something with you.
noGroups: You don't have any groups yet.
noGroupsDesc: Either create one yourself or remind others to add you to their groups.
shareWithWhom: With whom do you want to share this note?
noNotesDesc: You haven't uploaded any notes yet.
readonlyWarning: Please consider this note read-only: everytime you open it, Sekund will overwrite it with its most recent version.
publicGroupDesc: Public groups are visible to everyone – anyone can join
